about_the_game:
"This house better be spotless before I come back!"

This is a short indie horror game where you assume the role of a teenager tasked by his mom to clean the house during her night shift. A first person experience where you will have to do basic everyday chores, what might be boring if not for the supernatural forces brought along with the stormy night, turning simple mindless tasks into a true atmospheric nightmare where you will have to fight for your life and still have the house cleaned before daybreak.

Chores
The apartment is dirty and full of trash. You'll have to use all the cleaning supplies in the house to get it cleaned and in order

The Clock Ticks
The night might be shorter then expected. You'll have to get everything in order before the sunrise, or else... who knows what your mom might do

A Storm Approaches
Besides all the work you have ahead of you, dark forces will be there tonight to make everything harder. You will have to find out how to get rid of them if you want to survive the night and, even more important, have the apartment clean before your mom gets home

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood and insinuated consumption of alcohol and tobacco

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 8 MB RAM

short_description: "I want this apartment spotless!" shouts your mom before going to her night shift. Use your cleaning supplies and courage to have the house cleaned before your mom comes back. A first person short story about doing chores and avoiding evil forces to survive the night.
